name: Date stuffing
description:
Hi guys! I'd like to introduce you the real bare bone game. But yet there are some features) If you protest against my style of games, their shortness and simplicity (especially if you did not play any of my games)) do not play it, do not download it, insted of it comment, how bad it is)

But serious, I wanted to show you what's inside my games from visual point of view (do not mind the hair)), and concerning gameplay it is super simplified comparing to my paid games. Some people wanted demo, so here it is. Hope you will enjoy the game.

There is no weight gain except the belly, some peole like it so. So be ready, nothing else will gain any weight.
